alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will continue to impact portions of northeastern Saint Lucie, eastern Indian River and southeastern Brevard Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Sebastian Inlet State Park, or near Sebastian Inlet, and also near Valkaria and Grant, moving east and southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Fort Pierce, Sebastian, Vero Beach and Indian River Shores. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
